situation.title: Photography
situation.meta_description: Photography is possible, even with professional photographers both inside and outside.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Photography is possible, even with professional photographers. However taking a photo in a photo studio is prohibited.

It is necessary to follow all hygienic rules and governmental regulations - especially the restriction of free movement. The restriction of free movement only permits the stay of 2 people in public spaces. The exception to this rule applies to members of the same household (family, partners or friends who live together), people who work together, schoolchildren and students. People who this exception applies to, can appear in photos in groups larger than 2.

There is an exception from the obligation to wear a mask for the time needed to take the photograph. You can take off your mask while taking the photo, but put it back on when you're finished. The photographer has to wear a mask the whole time.

It is possible to take group photos, specifically family photos, photos with your partner, photos with close friends or photos of newlyweds. It is also possible to take portrait photos without a mask.

The rules surrounding photography try to enable photos with as few restrictions as possible, specifically without masks and social distancing. Despite this, please try to follow the hygienic rules and only take off your mask for the time necessary to take the photo. You will have your picture without a mask, and you'll still be protecting yourself and others.

Source

The obligation to wear a mask follows the extraordinary measures by the ministry of health here you can also find the exception concerning photography.

questions_answers.question: What size group am I allowed to photograph?
questions_answers.value: If you're photographing family members, people from the same household, work colleagues or classmates, the number isn't limited. In all other cases the maximum is 2 people.

questions_answers.question: Do we need to keep 2 meter distances in photos?
questions_answers.value: If you're taking a picture with family, people you live with or work colleagues, you don't need to keep the distance.

questions_answers.question: Can I film a video without my mask?
questions_answers.value: The same rules that apply to photos apply to videos. You can take your mask off while filming the video, but put it back on when you're done.

questions_answers.question: Can I take a photo of a family of five in a photo studio?
questions_answers.value: No, taking a photo in a photo studio is prohibited. But group photographs are allowed. Family members can take off their masks while the photo is being taken.

questions_answers.question: Can I take a photo of a group of friends inside?
questions_answers.value: Yes, these group photos are allowed. They can take off their masks while the photo is being taken.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a mask when taking a photo outside?
questions_answers.value: No, you can take your mask off for the time necessary to take the photo.

questions_answers.question: Do I need to wear a mask when taking a document photo?
Do I need to wear a mask when taking a selfie?
Do I need to wear a mask as a photographer?
Can I hire a photographer for my wedding?
questions_answers.value: Yes, it is still possible to take wedding pictures. For pictures of newlyweds or wedding guests it is possible to take your masks off. If taking pictures during the ceremony the obligation to wear a mask applies.
